description:
A fleece fit for movement, the Otero Hooded Jacket features a slim silhouette, a recycled polyester blend, a raised grid back for
more warmth and breathability, and concealed zippers. This technical fleece is great for cool weather hikes or other adventures.
Also available in men’s.
name: Cotopaxi Otero Fleece Full-Zip Hooded Jacket - Mens
